title: Ep. 158 S&A Investor - Buy Small Cap Stocks Now
itunes:title: Buy Small Cap Stocks Now
description: Chad Morganlander, fund manager at Stifel Nicholas, tells us how he is positioning his clients ahead of the fiscal cliff. Frank breaks down stocks and highlights why small-caps are trading at levels he's only seen twice in 18 years.
content:encoded: Chad Morganlander, fund manager at Stifel Nicholas, tells us how he is positioning his clients ahead of the fiscal cliff. Frank breaks down stocks and highlights why small-caps are trading at levels he's only seen twice in 18 years.
